results.title: Joker
results.overview: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

results.title: Joker
results.overview: In 1947 when the maps of India and Pakistan were being drawn, an oversight ensured that the village of Paglapur didn't find a place in either country. Over 60 years later, Paglapur is isolated, and in need of help. The residents seek help, but as a direct result of being left off the map, they find noone willing to accept Paglapur, and its problems, as their jurisdiction. The villagers decide they need to draw media attention to Paglapur, and in so doing, gain acceptance and help from those who had previously denied them.

results.original_title: Batman Beyond: Return of the Joker
results.title: Batman Beyond: Return of the Joker
results.overview: The Joker is back with a vengeance, and Gotham's newest Dark Knight needs answers as he stands alone to face Gotham's most infamous Clown Prince of Crime.

results.title: Joker Rising
results.overview: The dark and gritty story of where the Joker came from and how he became the villain that he is today.

results.title: The Joker Is Wild
results.overview: Frank Sinatra stars in director Charles Vidor's 1957 film biography of nightclub entertainer Joe E. Lewis. The cast also includes Mitzi Gaynor, Jeanne Crain, Eddie Albert, Beverly Garland, Jackie Coogan, Harold Huber, Barry Kelley, Ted de Corsia, Ned Glass, Mary Treen and Sid Melton.

results.title: Joker's Poltergeist
results.overview: After a clown-masked assailant guns down Aurora's Place, the resident theater owner fights to re-open her business.

results.title: JOKER: Marginal City
results.original_title: JOKER マージナル・シティ
results.overview: Joker is a cyborg who has superior strength, can absorb the DNA of any person by touch and regrow its body or part of it at will (hence Joker can be a male or a female). Joker belongs to a special troop of law enforcement: as cop, judge and executioner at the same time. Along with his/her lover, a police officer, they have dealt against criminals of every type.

results.title: King, Queen and Joker
results.overview: King, Queen, Joker is a 1921 silent feature farce written and directed by Sydney Chaplin, Charlie's older brother. The picture was produced by Famous Players-Lasky and distributed through Paramount Pictures. The film was shot in England, France and the United States. Less than a reel of this film, the barbershop sequence, survives at the British Film Institute. It was included in the 2011 Criterion DVD special two disc edition release of The Great Dictator.

results.title: Ero the Joker
results.overview: To find a wife who truly loves him, a young trickster disguises himself as a pauper. But getting her parents' blessing will take every trick in the book.  Part of the Croatian National Theatre’s repertoire since its premiere in 1935, Jakov Gotovac’s comic opera is an ode to a rural way of life. It culminates in a frenzied tempo with a vigorous ballet – a celebration of Dalmatian music and dance.

results.title: Mera Naam Joker
results.overview: The story of four friends who decide to start a Auto Mechanic story.

results.title: The Impractical Joker
results.overview: Betty Boop's baking is interrupted by obnoxious practical joking friend Irving. Can Grampy out-joke the joker?

results.title: Untitled Jared Leto / Joker Film
results.overview: Stand-alone project centering on The Joker from the 2016 film 'Suicide Squad'.

results.title: Untitled Harley Quinn & The Joker Project
results.original_title: Untitled Harley Quinn & The Joker Project
results.overview: A criminal love story. Plot unknown.

results.title: Adicts: Joker in the Pack
results.overview: Capturing The Adicts in their element, this release contains two live concerts recorded at The Manhattan Club, and at a Blackpool punk all-dayer. The Blackpool concert was filmed in 1982 on a lone VHS video camera, and presents the band exactly how they're supposed to sound: live and raw. The Manhattan Club gig dates from 1983 and see's the band in their element bashing out prime punk fare like "How Sad," "Joker in the Pack," "Steamroller" and more.

results.title: Jethro Live: 40 Years The Joker
results.overview: Jethro Live 2015 – What Happened Was…  The West Country’s greatest ever spinner of madness and mirth JETHRO, is back and live for the first time in 4 years and for the last time ever.  Filmed on one special night in Summer 2015 at Yeovil’s Octagon Theatre, What Happened Was… is a celebration of Jethro’s forty years as one of the great joke-masters of all time.  Jethro Live, Bonus In response to endless requests, Jethro finally revisits some of the favourite gags and stories – as voted for by YOU the fans – that have made him one of the UK’s best loved comedians, along with new gags, twists and added surprises along the way.
